markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Living Leaf Weave](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1978)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Plant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=125" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 64 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This suit of [leaf weave armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=28) is specially modified to metabolize the alchemical accelerants in medicinal compounds. A special receptacle in the armor can hold an [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91), which takes 3 Interact actions to install. A loaded suit of living leaf weave can be activated to grow slithering vines from the armor, granting an item bonus to [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) checks to [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=35), to your Fortitude DC to resist Grapple, [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41), or [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) attempts, and to your Reflex DCs to resist [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) attempts. The effects last for 3 rounds, consuming the elixir of life, and once the reaction has begun it can't be deactivated.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Living Leaf Weave
